persName.term: Alternate Personal Name, Previously Used Name

person.note: Zhang(1) Yu(15) [28391] CHECK funerary inscription. His first mingzi was Zezhi (澤之), which is generational name. He also used the mingzi, Sizhen (嗣真), probably his daoist name. WDY, 2, pp. 1055-1058.
